column2: In secret, Adoptionist faithfuls have organized around a small community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects its own.

The §YAdoptionist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
